fields.text: Thank you for calling Mixpanel in San Francisco, where we help you acquire, engage, and retain customers with actionable user analytics.
For sales inquiries and quotes, press '[INDEX]'.
For information on purchasing Mixpanel analytics solutions and pricing, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a Mixpanel sales representative.
For questions about your existing Mixpanel account or billing, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a Mixpanel account specialist.
If you are experiencing issues with data collection or event tracking, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a Mixpanel technical specialist.
If you need assistance accessing your Mixpanel dashboard or reporting features, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our support team for dashboard assistance.
